General.Name: Banestes S.A - Banco do Estado do Espírito Santo
General.Description: Banestes S.A - Banco do Estado do Espírito Santo S.A. provides various financial products and services to individual and corporate clients in the State of Espírito Santo, Brazil. The company offers loans to individuals and small, medium-sized, and large companies. It also offers import and export financing, such as advances on export contracts, advances on foreign-exchange contracts, letters of credit, and other products. The company was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Vitória, Brazil.
General.Address: Ed. Palas Center, Vitória, ES, Brazil, 29010-930
